name: Swamp Alchemy
description:
Far from the confines of society, lurking deep within their mist veiled swamp, the thaumaturge awaits. Blissfully burrowed away, tinkering with the unknown whilst the outer world gradually slips into ruin.

- Design, Art, and Writing -

Joe Dunkerley (@Cynical_Poet)

- Programming and Additional Design -

Clarence Simpson (@StoicHamster)

- Special Thanks -

"When Leaves Fall" music by AudioBlade (@AudioBladeMusic)

Sound FX by SoundJay and Shurk (@ShirkOfficial)
